title: New: Nautic – Fresh Eyes (ft. Slime)
content:
Photo by Kenis Federico

There are three types of collaboration in this world, ones that make sense, ones that don’t and ones that come out of nowhere. Nautic falls into the latter category, or maybe the first, fuck it maybe even both, evidently that theory didn’t work. But anyway, the 3-piece is made up of Bullion, Laura Groves (who used to make folk-pop as Blue Roses) and Tic of the Young Turks label, with their debut track also featuring the rather naughty saxophone tones of the ever dear to our hearts, Slime. In the simplest terms, ‘Fresh Eyes’ is an extremely promising piece of material. It never truly feels like a finished sound, but as a statement of intent it makes the process behind the making the track seem effortless, almost inevitable.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
